casebody.data:
UNITED SHOE MACHINERY CORPORATION v. VULCAN CORPORATION. No. 7867. Circuit Court of Appeals, Sixth Circuit. Nov. 14, 1938. Fish, Richardson & Neave, of Boston, Mass., and Bennett R. Knight, of Cincinnati, Ohio, for appellant. Allen & Allen, of Cincinnati, Ohio, for appellee.

Before HICKS, SIMONS, and ALLEN, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

It is ordered that the appeal herein be and the same is dismissed pursuant to stipulation of counsel.
